#include <iostream>
#include<limits.h>

#include<cstdio>

#define gc getchar_unlocked

using namespace std;

int get_int()
{  char c=gc();

while(c<'0'||c>'9')
 {
     c=gc();
     
 }
 int ret=0;
 
 while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
  {
      ret=ret*10+(c-'0');
      c=gc();
  }
  
  
  return  ret;
 
 
    
    
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n,q;
	cin>>n>>q;
	
	
	int a[n];
	
	int max=INT_MIN;
	int min=INT_MAX;
	
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	 {
	     a[i]=get_int();
	     
	     if(a[i]>=max)
	      {
	          max=a[i];
	      }
	      if(a[i]<=min)
	       {
	           min=a[i];
	       }
		 }
	int t;
	for(int i=0;i<q;i++)
	 {  t=get_int();
	// cin>>t;
	 if(t>max||t<min)
	  {
	      cout<<"No\n";
	  }
	  else
	  cout<<"Yes\n";
	     
	 }
	return 0;
}
